data.title: Things to do in Penafiel in November – Wanderlog
data.meta_description: Discover events happening in Penafiel in November and activities that are perfect for a November trip to Penafiel.
data.text:
Overview

November is a good time to visit Penafiel. The weather is usually moderately chilly with a gentle breeze, with temperatures ranging from 37—54°F (3—12°C).

Penafiel has plenty to offer for visitors of all ages and interests. In this article, we tell you the top things to see and do for your November trip to Penafiel. Get inspired by the events, activities, attractions, and experiences unique to November. We’ll let you know where to explore events based on your interests, whether that’s food, culture, art, music, sport or others.

We’ll let you know everything you need to prepare for the weather in Penafiel in November. Learn about what to wear and pack for your trip, the average temperatures throughout November, temperature changes from morning to evening and much more.

Visiting Penafiel? See our Penafiel Trip Planner.

Weather in Penafiel in November

Temperatures on an average day in Penafiel in November

The average temperature in Penafiel in November for a typical day ranges from a high of 54°F (12°C) to a low of 37°F (3°C). Some would describe it as moderately chilly with a gentle breeze.

For comparison, the hottest month in Penafiel, July, has days with highs of 86°F (30°C) and lows of 56°F (14°C). The coldest month, February has days with highs of 49°F (10°C) and lows of 31°F (-0°C). This graph shows how an average day looks like in Penafiel in November based on historical data.

Visiting Penafiel? See our Penafiel Trip Planner.

What to wear

What to wear in November

With an average high of 54°F (12°C) and a low of 37°F (3°C), it generally feels moderately chilly with a gentle breeze. There might also be a small chance of rain. With that in mind, most people would dress in something warm like a jacket
